Give Now









































            Power New Possibilities    

            Make an Impact by Supporting UCR    
Give Online ›





























 

A New Model for a Research University
With your involvement and support, UC Riverside can continue to be at the forefront of the research, innovation, and inclusion that is transforming California and beyond. Ranked in the top 15 for best public universities in the nation — and first for social mobility — UCR has created a new model for what a great public research university can achieve.
Support great minds today, for a greater world tomorrow.


 


















Make your gift today ›

















Stories of Impact













January 02, 2023


      Equipping the Next Generation of Researchers
    

      

  


  Endowed fund established by Nora A. Hackett supports students with lab and makerspace equipment in the Marlan and Rosemary Bourns College of Engineering.
    

Read More »









December 01, 2022


      Making Connections and Sharing Histories
    

      

  


  Distinguished Professor Clifford Trafzer reflects on 15 years as the Rupert Costo Chair in American Indian Affairs, the world’s first American Indian chair endowment.
    

Read More »









November 01, 2022


      Investing in What Matters
    

      

  


  Longtime support from philanthropists Mark and Pamela Rubin make a difference in our community and on campus at UCR, changing lives for the better.
    

Read More »

Student Research Success Stories
Philanthropic investment from alumni, staff, faculty, students, and friends of the university provide opportunities for students to participate in meaningful research, and receive academic, professional, and personal support while pursuing their dreams.
